original_body_lines: The Examinations Department today announced the dates for holding the practical exams for 2022 (2023) GCE Ordinary Level (O/L), Commissioner General H.J.M.C. Amith Jayasundara said.
He said the practical examinations will be held from August 02 and continue till August 12 at 1,355 examination centres around the country.
Practical exams for Aesthetic Music will be held on August 6 (Sunday), he said.
Practical examinations for Aesthetic Music, Western Music, Karnatic Music, Local Dancing, Bharatha Dancing, Drama and Theater in Sinhala, Tamil and English mediums will be held on these dates.
Applications for school applicants have been posted to the respective school principals and the applications for private candidates have been posted to their respective addresses.
The Department requests applicants to contact it for more information if needed. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
